channel.title: Bike Tour on Peter Grimshaw's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Bike Tour on Peter Grimshaw's Site

item.title: One Person, Two Wheels and a Tent
item.description: The last couple of months I have been planning a bike tour, and I just came back from the ride so I wanted to write about the whole experience! Planning and Preparation I have done a bike tour previously with an old-school touring bike, but that time I booked accommodation each night (a.k.a credit-card touring). This time I wanted to carry my own gear. Depending on your perspective I made the task a lot harder for myself by deciding to sell that old-school touring bike as I didn’t like the feel of riding it.
